fields.name: name
docs: The name of the vault. Vault pubkey is derived from this name.

fields.name: pubkey
docs: The vault's pubkey. It is a pda of name and also used as the authority for drift user

fields.name: manager
docs: The manager of the vault who has ability to update vault params

fields.name: tokenAccount
docs: The vaults token account. Used to receive tokens between deposits and withdrawals

fields.name: userStats
docs: The drift user stats account for the vault

fields.name: user
docs: The drift user account for the vault

fields.name: delegate
docs: The vaults designated delegate for drift user account
can differ from actual user delegate if vault is in liquidation

fields.name: liquidationDelegate
docs: The delegate handling liquidation for depositor

fields.name: userShares
docs: The sum of all shares held by the users (vault depositors)

fields.name: totalShares
docs: The sum of all shares: deposits from users, manager deposits, manager profit/fee, and protocol profit/fee.
The manager deposits are total_shares - user_shares - protocol_profit_and_fee_shares.

fields.name: lastFeeUpdateTs
docs: Last fee update unix timestamp

fields.name: liquidationStartTs
docs: When the liquidation starts

fields.name: redeemPeriod
docs: The period (in seconds) that a vault depositor must wait after requesting a withdrawal to finalize withdrawal.
Currently, the maximum is 90 days.

fields.name: totalWithdrawRequested
docs: The sum of all outstanding withdraw requests

fields.name: maxTokens
docs: Max token capacity, once hit/passed vault will reject new deposits (updatable)

fields.name: managementFee
docs: The annual fee charged on deposits by the manager.
Traditional funds typically charge 2% per year on assets under management.

fields.name: initTs
docs: Timestamp vault initialized

fields.name: netDeposits
docs: The net deposits for the vault
